content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in München to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Regarding the rental price, I'm open to discussing a fair market value that reflects the quality of the apartment and its prime location in the city center. What is your initial budget or expectation for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. Munich is a very expensive city. However, I have found apartments of a similar size and location for around €700 per month. I am a student, so I am on a tight budget. I am willing to pay €700 per month for this apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that Munich can be expensive, especially for students. Your budget of €700 per month is quite reasonable for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I believe we can come to an agreement based on this figure. Would you be willing to pay a slightly higher price if the apartment meets your expectations regarding quality and location?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your understanding, Mister Schmidt. As a student, €700 is the highest amount I can afford for rent. I am willing to pay €700 for this apartment. I am confident that it is a fair price for an apartment of this size and location in Munich.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of €700 per month! Let's proceed with the lease agreement. Thank you for choosing my apartment, and I'm sure you'll find it a great place to live during your studies in Munich.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I am looking forward to signing the lease agreement and moving into the apartment. I appreciate your understanding and cooperation.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: You're welcome, Maryam. I'm glad to have you as a tenant. Please let me know if you have any questions or need assistance with the lease agreement. Enjoy your stay in Munich!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I don't have any more questions or concerns. I am ready to sign the lease agreement. I look forward to moving into the apartment soon.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Excellent, Maryam. I'll prepare the lease agreement and we can meet to sign it. In the meantime, if you need to contact me for any reason, please do so at this number. Thank you again for renting my apartment. I'm sure it will be a smooth and enjoyable experience for both of us. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
